snippet.title: Dark Souls II SOTFS Seeker of Fire overhaul mod
snippet.description:
I kind of wanted to make this kind of thing for a while now, looks like my compositions are as clean as I left off. I miss this kind of stuff.  The Faraam set in this video has been updated to be a little cleaner with some restorations to the cloth. Won't be releasing that until 2.0

Mod link: https://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls2/mods/978

Song Used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XTkjgGNvMC0
In case Youtube hits me with random copyright, but anyway I don't own anything in this song. Song belongs to Yuka Kitamura, Fromsoft, and Bandai Namco.
